text:
(a)     SSIP shall be administered by the Department of Human Services.
     (b)     The Executive Director shall establish the rules and regulations, consistent with this Article, for the proper administration of SSIP. 
     (c)     In actual emergencies, the Executive Director of the Department of Human Services may make exceptions to this Article pending action by the Board of Supervisors. Such emergency exceptions shall be reported to the Board of Supervisors within five working days. 
(Added by Ord. 151-98, App. 5/8/98)
